5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Amr bin Shu’aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade Ihtiba’ (sitting with one's thighs gathered up against the stomach while wrapping one's arm or garment around them) on Fridays, meaning, when the Imam is delivering the sermon.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحِلَقِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ قَبْلَ الصَّلاَةِ وَالاِحْتِبَاءِ وَالإِمَامُ يَخْطُبُ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning sitting in circles on Fridays before the Prayer, and Ihtiba’ when the Imam is delivering the sermon
